description:
Réseau Marguerite is an initiative based in Lyon that focuses on enhancing agricultural and food education in secondary schools. It supports teachers in developing educational projects related to food justice, sustainability, and the agri-food system. The network currently assists 17 schools in the Lyon region and aims to foster critical awareness among students regarding food issues.

Réseau Marguerite also aims to create accessible educational resources, such as downloadable guides and activity kits, to empower teachers and students to address food-related issues. The initiative seeks to give teenagers a voice in food education and empower them to engage with local food systems and issues.
name: Reseau Marguerite
